original_text: And they made two other golden rings, and put them on the two sides of the ephod underneath, toward the forepart of it, over against the other coupling thereof, above the curious girdle of the ephod.
korean_text: 또 금 고리 둘을 만들어 에봇 앞 두 어깨받이 아래 매는 자리 가까운 쪽 곧 정교하게 짠 에봇 띠 위쪽에 달고

sentences.original_text: And they made two other golden rings
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 두 개의 다른 금 고리를 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and put them on the two sides of the ephod underneath
over against the other coupling thereof
